 URL for License*

 http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-1.1

Purpose*

 When added along with crimson.jar and xalan.jar to JDK 1.3.x they provide the xml language features of JDK 1.4.x that are required to build and work with the Flat XML filter in the OpenOffice.org filter modules. These jars are needed for JDK 1.3.1 build and runtime capabilities for OpenOffice.org.

Type of Encryption*

none

Binary or Source Code?*

binary (100% java)
